attributes.action: Ensure that British Police adopt a supportive attitude towards social motorcycling events.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over recent months the Police have taken an unfair if not openly hostile attitude towards Social Motorcycling Events. Most recently the Welsh National Motorcycle show, a wonderful family event was cancelled following pressure that the Police applied.
They did not even consult with the organisers so that any concerns could have been addressed.
The police should be there to ensure that peace loving people can enjoy events such as these, would this have happened at any other public event? A Football match perhaps? Of course not. 
I call on the Government to ensure that the Police respect our Civil Liberties and that they take the same proactive and supportive role as they would at any other social gathering.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
